Preparemonos todo el artículo para que nuestras respuestas vayan enfocadas al punto correcto, todo hacia el título del artículo o subtema. Idea general - Idea secundaria 
Idea principal: Como quieres que sea tu vida, queremos una vida feliz. 
Breve y directo. Aplicaciones nunca van dirigidas al auditorio, las aplicaciones van dirigidas a uno mismo.

Párrafos pares entrarán por su lado izquierdo

*Oficina de cobranza Inpecable S.R.L*.

 *Si efectuaste el pago antes de recibir el mensaje, por favor omita el recordatorio*.

 ✅ AVISO IMPORTANTE. 

Para efectuar el pagos por CAJA CUSCO deberá seguir las siguientes instrucciones :
1-.*Pagos en oficina: Indica que pagara para INPECABLE  SRL2, luego dicta el DNI del titular*.
2-.*Pagos en agentes:  Indica que pagara para INPECABLE  SRL2, luego dicta el 459+ DNI del titular*.
3-.*Pagos en APP WAYKI: Selecciona pagos por servicios de internet, busca la empresa INPECABLE SRL2, en la parte de código digita el DNI del titular*.

Pisaq was a rollercoaster but you made it feel like a walk in the park, it was so much fun! I’ll think about you every time I read Rut 3:11 “And now, my daughter, have no fear. I will do for you everything that you say, for everyone in the city knows that you are an excellent woman” I think that you are such an amazing young lady, you had a life there, a good life, and decided to leave friends and family for Jehovah, I can only imagine how happy you make him. We can ask every person you met here, I can assure you they will agree, what an excellent woman you are. Seeing you every day on the service was a bless. Keep touching hearts and making everything around you shine. 

My pretty little beautiful muñequita I will forever be grateful to you; you paid attention to all my silly thoughts and were there when I thought I had a broken heart. You stay, you laugh, vent, and dance with me. Thank you. I’m so excited to see what Jehovah has in store for all of us, I don’t know what is going to happen next, but I’m sure if we keep serving Jehovah with all our hearts, we’ll have a great life. Like the name of your favorite flowers, please, forget me not. 

Ohhh words cannot express how happy I am to see you blossom day by day, you won’t get rid of me, I’ve decided to stay, bear with me for eternity. I want to go see the new world with you. Danke mein Freund! 🥰❤️

With love, your dramatic and silly friend, 
Xiomara 😽

Till thee came closer to me 
In shame and shameless thoughts 
In Fighting armies beating all of us

You stood there changing all of that 
You stood there, even when I didn't let you get close 
You fought and swore I'll never be alone 
So shamelessly I put the blame on thee
For he made me see what a good life he can bring 

Shame was part of me every day  
Now I can show you who I truly am 
I put the blame on thee 
For he made me see what a beautiful thing is 
To love someone shamelessly
